text: The Wind () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Alov and Vladimir Naumov.ВЕТЕР (1958)Ветер (1958) It stars Eduard Bredun, Tamara Loginova, and Elza Lezhdey. == Actors == * Eduard Bredun as Fedor * Tamara Loginova as Nastya * Elza Lezhdey as Mari * Aleksandr Demyanenko as Mitya * Aleksey Krychenkov * Ivan Aleksandrov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:1959 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Naumov Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Alov
title: The Wind (1959 movie)
